# AVAudioUnitGenerator

**Class**

An object that generates audio output.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVAudioUnitGenerator
```

## Overview

A generator represents an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioUnit] of type `kAudioUnitType_Generator` or `kAudioUnitType_RemoteGenerator`. A generator has no audio input, but produces audio output. An example is a tone generator.

## Creating an audio unit generator

- **init(audioComponentDescription:)**: Creates a generator audio unit with the specified description.

## Getting and setting the bypass status

- **bypass**: The bypass state of the audio unit.

## Inherits From

- AVAudioUnit

## Conforms To

- AVAudio3DMixing
- AVAudioMixing
- AVAudioStereoMixing
- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
